**IMPORTANT!** Submit your PR against the right branch:
- `4.x` is for AngularDart 4.0 stable (https://webdev.dartlang.org)
- `master` is for AngularDart 5.0 preview (https://webdev-dartlang-org-dev.firebaseapp.com)
